title: Cast samples_per_bin to int to fix type error
body_html:
Currently running python test/test_distributions.py locally would give TypeError: 'float' object cannot be interpreted as an integer because we are passing float to reshape().

CI didn't catch this bug because scipy is not installed by default and thus the related test cases are skipped.
body_text:
Currently running python test/test_distributions.py locally would give TypeError: 'float' object cannot be interpreted as an integer because we are passing float to reshape().
CI didn't catch this bug because scipy is not installed by default and thus the related test cases are skipped.
body:
Currently running `python test/test_distributions.py` locally would give `TypeError: 'float' object cannot be interpreted as an integer` because we are passing float to `reshape()`.

CI didn't catch this bug because `scipy` is not installed by default and thus the related test cases are skipped.
